summary: APRIL 2015 FORD BAGAN RECALLING VEHICLES FOR DOOR LATCH PROBLEMS. IN THE INTERVENING 2+ YEARS, FORD HAS, MULTIPLE TIMES, EXPANDED THE NUMBER AND MODELS OF VEHICLES INCLUDED IN THE RECALL. AUGUST 2016, IS WAS PUBLICLY ANNOUNCED (HTTP://AUTOWEEK.COM/ARTICLE/RECALLS/FORD-RECALLS-830000-CARS-DOOR-LATCH-ISSUE) MY 2013 ESCAPE WAS INCLUDED IN THE RECALL. MID-AUGUST 2016, MY LEFT PASSENGER DOOR LATCH BROKE. HAD TO TIE BOTH BACK DOORS CLOSED WITH ROPE. SEPTEMBER 2, 2016 THAT FORD ACKNOWLEDGED MY VEHICLE WAS INCLUDED IN THE RECALL AND AN OFFICIAL RECALL NOTICE (SEE ATTACHED). TO DATE, FORD IS NOT ABLE TO SATISFY THE RECALL ACTION DUE TO LACK OF PARTS. THIS IS UNACCEPTABLE AND IS ALLOWING UNSAFE VEHICLES TO BE OPERATED ON AMERICAN ROADWAYS WITHOUT REMEDY.
